member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.CustomizationType
member.summary: Indicates the customization-type. Customization-type is System if is system generated or by default. Customization-type is Inherited if the existing workitemtype of inherited process is customized. Customization-type is Custom if the newly created workitemtype is customized.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.CustomizationType.System
member.summary: Customization-type is System if is system generated workitemtype.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.CustomizationType.Inherited
member.summary: Customization-type is Inherited if the existing workitemtype of inherited process is customized.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.CustomizationType.Custom
member.summary: Customization-type is Custom if the newly created workitemtype is customized.

member.summary: Expand options to fetch fields for behaviors API.

member.summary: Default none option.

member.summary: This option returns fields associated with a behavior.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.GetBehaviorsExpand.CombinedFields
member.summary: This option returns fields associated with this behavior and all behaviors from which it inherits.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.ProcessBehavior.Customization
member.summary: Indicates the type of customization on this work item. System behaviors are inherited from parent process but not modified. Inherited behaviors are modified modified behaviors that were inherited from parent process. Custom behaviors are behaviors created by user in current process.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.MakeRequired
F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.MakeReadOnly
F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.SetDefaultValue
member.summary: Set a default value on the target field. This is used if the user creates a integer/string field and sets a default value of this field.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.SetDefaultFromClock
member.summary: Set the default value on the target field from server clock. This is used if user creates the field like Date/Time and uses default value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.SetDefaultFromCurrentUser
member.summary: Set the default current user value on the target field. This is used if the user creates the field of type identity and uses default value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.SetDefaultFromField
member.summary: Set the default value on from existing field to the target field. This used wants to set a existing field value to the current field.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.CopyValue
member.summary: Set the value of target field to given value. Example : {actionType: "$copyValue", targetField: "ScrumInherited.mypicklist", value: "samplevalue"}

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.CopyFromClock
member.summary: Set the value from clock.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.CopyFromCurrentUser
member.summary: Set the current user to the target field. Example : {"actionType":"$copyFromCurrentUser","targetField":"System.AssignedTo","value":""}.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.CopyFromField
member.summary: Copy the value from a specified field and set to target field. Example : {actionType: "$copyFromField", targetField: "System.AssignedTo", value:"System.ChangedBy"}. Here, value is copied from "System.ChangedBy" and set to "System.AssingedTo" field.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.SetValueToEmpty
member.summary: Set the value of the target field to empty.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.CopyFromServerClock
member.summary: Use the current time to set the value of the target field. Example : {actionType: "$copyFromServerClock", targetField: "System.CreatedDate", value: ""}

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleActionType.CopyFromServerCurrentUser
member.summary: Use the current user to set the value of the target field.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleCondition
member.summary: Defines a condition on a field when the rule should be triggered.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleCondition.ConditionType
member.summary: Type of condition. $When. This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has a particular value, i.e. when the Is value of the referenced field is equal to the given literal value. $WhenNot.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field does not have a particular value, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is not equal to the given literal value. $WhenChanged.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has changed, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is not equal to the Was value of that field. $WhenNotChanged.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has not changed, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is equal to the Was value of that field.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleCondition.Field
member.summary: Field that defines condition.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleCondition.Value
member.summary: Value of field to define the condition for rule.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleConditionType
member.summary: Type of rule condition.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleConditionType.When
member.summary: $When. This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has a particular value, i.e. when the Is value of the referenced field is equal to the given literal value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleConditionType.WhenNot
member.summary: $WhenNot.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field does not have a particular value, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is not equal to the given literal value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleConditionType.WhenChanged
member.summary: $WhenChanged.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has changed, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is not equal to the Was value of that field.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Process.WebApi.Models.RuleConditionType.WhenNotChanged
member.summary: $WhenNotChanged.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has not changed, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is equal to the Was value of that field.
